benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Constitution or Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Damage Reduction
effects: When you're hit by an attack while you're wearing Heavy armor, any Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage dealt to you by that attack is reduced by an amount equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
